name: Among the old
description:
Heyooo, so so. This is a school project that i might continue working on.
Also a warning. Because i used clickteam fusion to make this, exe files tend to be falsely flagged as viruses when its just silly clickteam shenanigans :P And i'm not sure how to go about fixing the false positive

Story:
You play as a dubious little cheese wheel named cheeseter, and the world is "plagued" with rodent like creatures (Sometimes eldritch in nature)

Controls:
ASWD to move
E to interact
T to open the list on the first level (Make sure you check it frequently)
Left and right click to attack  (Because i forgot to mention it in the game. But right click is a ranged attack but it sacrifices a bit of health since cheeseter is literally yeeting a portion of himself)
R to pop a health potion (Provided you got em and your health is below 100)
Shift to use the grippy hands to climb, but only on the second level.
It can be kinda tricky at first, but once you master it you can get pretty much anywhere
